Welcome to my virtual abode! Whether you're a recruiter or curious Triton who's heard my name before, here is where I hope you'll find lots of interesting tidbits. I created this website with the intention of showcasing both my academic and non-academic side, so if you have any relevant comments while browsing around, hit that Email button, and I'm all ears. Hope you have a wonderful time looking around!


(That's me in the middle 🙃)
